price: Waɗanda suke idan Muka bã su ĩko a cikin ƙasa sai su tsai da salla, kuma su baybr da zakka kuma su yi umurni da abin da aka sani,* kuma su hana daga abin da ba a sani ba. Kuma ãƙibar al'amura ga Allah take.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِن مَّكَّنَّٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَمَرُواْ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَنَهَوۡاْ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِۗ وَلِلَّهِ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
footnotes: * Abin da aka sani daga shar'ia watau shĩ ne alheri, kuma abin da ba a sani ba ga shari'a, watau sharri wanda Allah bã Ya so, akasin alheri. Tsayar da ayyukan alheri ba zai isa ba sai anã yin wa'azi ga mutãne a umarce su da yin alhħri kuma a hana su daga aikata sharri.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
